sentences.english: Lessons must remain learned from the past wars.
sentences.chinese: 必需从过往的战争中罗致履历哺育。

sentences.english: The warrior is able to draw strength from the benevolent spirits of the Fade.
sentences.chinese: 战士能够大黑甜乡中的友善魂灵上罗致力量。

sentences.english: If you fail; donat forget to learn your lesson.
sentences.chinese: 借使你失败了，千万别忘了罗致训导。

sentences.english: It cannot be utilized which will haudio-videoe grelocated at influence for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 它不能被罗致这将对环境变成很大的影响。
